splits.name: Apple Inc.
splits.notes: Board approved Jul 30, 2020 alongside Q3 FY2020 earnings. Articles of Incorporation amended Aug 3, 2020 increasing authorized shares from 12.6B to 50.4B. Record date Aug 24, 2020. Effective at 5:00 PM PT Aug 28, 2020. Split-adjusted trading began Aug 31, 2020. Fifth split in company history.

splits.name: NextEra Energy, Inc.
splits.notes: Board approved 4-for-1 forward split on Sep 14, 2020. Record date Oct 19, 2020. Distribution of three additional shares per share held on Oct 26, 2020. Split-adjusted trading began Oct 27, 2020.

splits.name: Power Integrations, Inc.
splits.notes: Board approved 2-for-1 split effected as stock dividend of one share per outstanding share. Announced Jul 30, 2020 alongside Q2 2020 earnings. Record date Aug 14, 2020. Shares distributed Aug 18, 2020. Split-adjusted trading began Aug 19, 2020.

splits.name: Tesla, Inc.
splits.notes: Board approved 5-for-1 split in the form of a stock dividend. Announced Aug 11, 2020. Record date Aug 21, 2020. Distribution of four additional shares after close of trading Aug 28, 2020. Split-adjusted trading began Aug 31, 2020.
